ingredient: 1/2 cup (or to taste) creamy Caesar dressing
2 lbs. pork short ribs or pork side ribs
4 large potatoes, peeled and cubed (2" cubes)
1.5 Tbsp stone ground or whole grain mustard
6 cups chopped cabbage (1 small head, 2.25 lbs)
1 cup kimchi* plus 2-4 Tbsp kimchi juice
1/8 tsp instant or bread machine yeast
2 tsp butter (for greasing the muffin tin)
1/4 lb. frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed
3/4 cup lemon juice (about 4 lemons) + 1 Tbsp zest
